overview: In his final years, forgotten muralist Fernando Daza is in the process of creating a new work by the name “Solo el Amor Resucita.” While the artist paints, the limits between poetry, muralism, and geography fade as we are taken on a trip from Chile’s north to its south. Time will the painter’s main issue: at 85 years old, his mind and his heart want to keep creating, but it is his body that will have the last word.
title: Y solo el amor resucita
